name: vmac-entry
description: Represents a mapping between a BACnet virtual MAC address and a native MAC address.

fields.name: virtual-mac-address
fields.description: The virtual MAC address used in BACnet networks.

fields.name: native-mac-address
fields.description: The native (physical) MAC address corresponding to the virtual MAC address.
